dataList.dlg: Mission control, providing command support. Come on, let's finish this before the Ring Nursefather gets here.
Combustion reaction detected from corpse manikins! Destroy them before they're fully primed!
Wear her down as much as possible before she— Before the sword comes at you with greater ferocity!
Wait, I recognize that from the postmortem report—ah! R-remain on standby and don't engage! Don't attack her now!
Hohenheim's done well... The target will be neutralized soon.
You're facing a Maestro of the Ring... But there's no way around this fight. Everyone, please do your best...!
One of our allies is—! Quick, destroy that effigy!
Wear her down as much as possible before she— Before the sword comes at you with greater ferocity!
This attack'll cover the entire battlefield...! There's no time to get out of its area—you have to stand your ground and meet it head-on...!
Miss Alyssa... What are you doing?!
B2-Level Emergency confirmed! Please inject the wounded with the K Corp. Ampule as per the protocol.
What... what is happening? Sinclair's combat parameters are...!
They... they can't handle this much force from both enemies...! Th-there's got to be a way to counter this...!
He wiped them all out with just a single strike...
... Battle forecast updated... "Dominating." Sinclair, just how...?
